TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MonthChangedEventHandler(object sender, MonthChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed MonthChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub MonthChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As MonthChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void MonthChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, MonthChangedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件，當使用者按一下瀏覽控制項的控制項來顯示一個或下一個月份。The event is raised when the user clicks the navigation controls for the control to display the next or previous month. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式中顯示的事件控制項是否控制項已移往前或往後的一個月。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event that displays in a control whether the control has moved forward or backward one month. [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchangedvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchanged2vb.aspx#1)]
